name: Nelagnelag.GitHub.io
tagline: Machine Learning and Fun Tutorials and Solutions
body:
I enjoy understanding Machine Learning and Data Science methods and concepts and communicating them with others, especially in a fun way.

I also realize that many people from other countries are entering this field, and hope to improve their English along with technical skills.   Feel free to contact me about that too!

### About me:  
I am an experienced native English researcher in Computer Science, Research, Data Science, and Machine Learning.

### Python Tutorial in your browser

Here is a link to my [my repository](https://github.com/nelagnelag), 
including a version of the [Python Tutorial](https://docs.python.org/3/tutorial/) converted to run in a Jupyter Notebook in your browser!

Go here and download Anaconda version 3.5: (pre-packaged python for easy installation):

    * [https://www.continuum.io/downloads](https://www.continuum.io/downloads)  (link on the RIGHT for Python 3)

    * start with
    > jupyter-notebook 3_An_Informal_Introduction_to_Python_(3).ipynb

I hope this helps :)

@nelagnelag
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
